scripts.test:android:bundle:release: mkdir -p .tmp && react-native bundle --max-workers 4 --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output .tmp/android-bundle.js
scripts.test:ios:bundle:release: mkdir -p .tmp && react-native bundle --max-workers 4 --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output .tmp/ios-bundle.js
scripts.test:clean: rimraf android/build && rimraf android/app/build && rimraf android/.gradle && rimraf ios/build

ios.sim.debug.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -workspace ios/ReactNativeImageEditorExample.xcworkspace -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 12' -scheme ReactNativeImageEditorExample -parallelizeTargets -configuration Debug -derivedDataPath ios/build  -UseModernBuildSystem=YES
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone 12

ios.sim.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -workspace ios/ReactNativeImageEditorExample.xcworkspace -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 12' -scheme ReactNativeImageEditorExample -parallelizeTargets -configuration Release -derivedDataPath ios/build  -UseModernBuildSystem=YES
ios.sim.release.name: iPhone 12

android.emu.debug.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && pushd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=debug && popd
android.emu.debug.name: TestingAVD

android.emu.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && pushd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=release && popd
android.emu.release.name: TestingAVD
